TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed BaseDevModeType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the type of default [DEVMODE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd183565) structure to use as the base [DEVMODE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd183565) for conversions of managed <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket"> objects to unmanaged [DEVMODE](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd183565) structures.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use a value of this enumeration primarily as a parameter in the <xref:System.Printing.Interop.PrintTicketConverter.ConvertPrintTicketToDevMode%2A> method.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.Interop.BaseDevModeType PrinterDefault = int32(1)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.Interop.BaseDevModeType UserDefault = int32(0)
